references.title: Building impactful apps together: GDSC Sookmyung Leads story in Seoul, South Korea
references.mainText: Students can benefit from Google Developer Student Clubs by learning and building together in a supportive peer-to-peer environment. Hear a first-hand experience of how the students at Sookmyung Women's University GDSC chapter are building professional relationships, growing their skills, and creating life-changing apps together. Learn about their app NotiNote, selected in the Global Top 50 Solution Challenge projects. NotiNote helps parents of multicultural families who are not proficient in Korean quickly translate and understand the school newsletter.
